resources.string: Welcome to Demo for FunSDK!\n©2024, Powered by JFTECH.
Request to send verification code succeeded

Select whether to use the local password saving function here (valid at the next startup). If this function is used, the myapplication class will set the save path during initialization, and the password setting will be saved every time the device is successfully logged in. To obtain the local password, you can call FunSDK.DevGetLocalPwd () interface
Interface call returned error, please check
The captcha should be a four digit integer
Please submit the verification code first
Please check the format of the new password
The password you entered is too simple
Please make sure that the password you entered is the same
please enter your mobile phone number
modify the password successfully, please use the new password to log in again
new password is not up to standard
Please make sure that you enter the same password twice
can also choose the following way to log in
before and after the password does not match
user name length does not match
"Email is used when filling in/retrieving the password correctly"
serial number to connect the device
here, you can configure the resolution, number of frames, audio, video
The device supports various alarm triggering and linkage, you can configure it here
This setting allows you to change the recording mode, turn off the audio, and change the file length
through this setting, you can change the image quality, image character overlay
this function is mainly some more specialized setting items
through this setting, you can change the image resolution, frame rate, image quality, image character superimposition
you can change the access password of the device, which is very important to protect privacy
If you turn it off, the indicator light of the device will no longer light up, which means you will not be able to determine the operating status of the device (invalid in AP mode)
this option allows you to view and manage the storage space of the device, you can format it
fisheye bulb switch and brightness control
Through this function, you can generate a QR code that contains the login account information, and you can control the device by scanning it on WeChat.
This function can simply count the approximate power consumption, the power consumption is for reference only
the results display and configure the Json string (please check the format strictly, the wrong format and type may cause the device to be abnormal)
login user name, the default is: admin
please enter the device login password
In addition to manually entering the device serial number,\nthe following are devices in the same LAN, you can choose one of the tests:\nExecute [connected devices in the LAN]
When the switch is turned on, if the device detects a moving object, an alarm event will be triggered
When the switch is turned on, if the device detects a moving object, it will start recording
When the switch is turned on, if the device detects a moving object, it will grab a picture
when the device triggers an alarm, it will push a message to the phone
Alarm sensitivity is divided into three levels: low, intermediate, and high
When the switch is turned on, if the device detects that the front is blocked, an alarm event will be triggered
When the switch is turned on, if the device lens is blocked, it will start recording
When the switch is turned on, if the device lens is blocked, a picture will be captured
This device does not support this feature
when the device triggers an alarm, it will push a message to the phone
This function is only valid under the linkage recording caused by the alarm or wireless remote control, it can pre-record the recording before the alarm is generated
this function allows you to change the length of the video file stored in the device
If you select config recording, you can set the all-day recording or alarm recording mode

If you select alarm recording, it means that the device does not usually record, and only starts recording when there is an alarm such as motion detection or a recording command from a dedicated remote control is received
If it is closed, the recorded file has no audio

If the device supports soft photosensitivity, the day-night mode can select automatic infrared/white full-color/black and white mode/intelligent warm light/intelligent infrared. If not, the day-night mode can select automatic infrared/white full-color/black and white mode.(The selection effect is only for reference)
the image is flipped up and down

If it is turned on, the image will be flipped 180 degrees, which is very useful for device flipping (when using this function, if the image is upside down, you need to use the "image left and right flip" function)
If opened, the image will be flipped left and right
whether the function is set to display the watermark time
This function allows you to superimpose your favorite personalized signature, place name, event title, etc. into the image, which can enrich the information of the image and make the video emotional
If you turn on this function, you can effectively compensate for the darkness of the main body of the picture when the camera is shooting in a backlight environment.
If you turn on this function, you can effectively solve the problem of too bright background or too dark foreground in the captured image when the contrast between light and dark is too large.

If you use white balance under the light, the color tone of the picture will be restored to the original state, and the white balance will correct the error caused by the external light according to the image characteristics of the current portrait.
when the light is not good, there will be noise. The higher the noise reduction level, the less noise.
reduce the picture blur caused by high-frequency jitter
in a low-light environment, improve the screen brightness. Will cause the dynamic image to blur
in the foggy weather, make the image effect transparent
whether to format the device disk?
server domain name (domain name is 28181 number)
video motion detection alarm is enabled

Please set a preset number less than 200
unknown device, please contact the manufacturer

Accessing the device directly without requiring an account login

If your devices are all hosted on your cloud server and you don\'t want to go through our account system, you can simply add your devices to the app cache. Please refer to the example code in the demo for the specific implementation!
